column1: Uchi////Some work colleagues and I headed to Uchi while in town for a conference.  SO LUCKY to have had this incredible culinary haven recommended!   Uchi was beyond amazing!  The variety in tastes ran a spectrum from a typical but still excellent sashimi salmon
column3: to a PHENOMENAL wagyu beef suvseared on a hot rock was like nothing I've really experienced anywhere else
column4: even above similar menued restaurants on the West Coast.  Can't wait to take my wife downtown as soon as possible so we can share the experience together!  Sincerely WOWED!
